subject: ATTN
body:
ATTN
I AM MR MUHHAMED ABASS WEST AFRICA THAT I NEED YOUR QUICK ASSISTANCE FOR PARTNERSHIP INVESTMENT IN YOUR COUNTRY, I AM A PERSONAL ASSISTANCE TO MR BRICK HAMID  WHO IS THE OWNER SUM OF $50MILLION US DOLLARS PACKAGE IN 1 BOXE IN RAW CASH WITH THE SECURITY VAULT IN BENIN WEST AFRICA FOR SAFEKEEPING AND NOBODY AWARE THAT IS MONEY THAT MY LATE BOSS KEPT IN THE 1 BOXE WHAT WE DECLARED AS THE CONTENT OF THE BOX IS GOLD MATERIALS FOR SECURITY REASON AND I AM THE ONLY PERSON WITNESS OF THE TRANSACTION WITH MY LATE BOSS SO IT IS TOP HIGHLY CONFIDENTIAL SECRET.
FURTHERMORE  MY LATE BOSS DIED IN ISRAEL-HAMAS WAR IN GAZA AS PALESTINIAN  CITIZEN AND DUE TO ISRAEL ATTACK TO HAMAS IN GAZA MY LATE BOSS DIED IN A BOMB BLAST WITH IS FAMILY 
IN THIS  ISRAEL MISSILE ATTACK IN GAZA AND I AM LIVING IN OTHER STATE OF THE COUNTRY AND FROM NEWS WE GOT TO KNOW THAT IS MY BOSS IS AMONG THE BOMB ATTACK WITH ALL IS FAMILY AND FROM THIS SITUATION WE ARE FACING GLOBALLY  I HAVE TO ESCAPE WITH  MASSES TO COME BACK TO GHANA INSTEAD TO STAY TO DO REFUGE IN ANY COUNTRY BECAUSE I KNOW THAT WE HAVE BIG MONEY IN COTONOU TO CLAIM BEFORE IS SUDDEN DEATH.
I WILL OFFER WHOEVER TO ASSIST ME TO CLAIM THIS BOX OF MONEY AS THE OWNER AND AND TO BE THE NEXT OF KIN TO MY LATE BOSS FOR EASY COLLECTION OF THE 1 BOXE WITHOUT ANY DELAY FROM THE SECURITY VAULT.
MY SUGGESTION SO FAR I WILL OFFER YOU  40% FROM THE TOTAL FUND $50MILLION US DOLLARS.
I WILL BE IN SHARE OF 60% AS THE REAL CONTACT OF THE OPPORTUNITY TO THE FUND THAT GIVE YOU THIS GOLDEN DIVINE SUCCESS IN YOUR LIFE 
IF YOU AGREE TO TRAVEL AND MEET ME IN  COTONOU WEST AFRICA I NEED ALL THIS DETAILS FOR THE PROCUREMENT OF THE BENEFICIARY ID CARD FROM VAULT
AS YOU IS THE OWNER OF THE 1 BOXE IN THEIR VAULT CUSTODY.
 1, SEND TO ME YOUR SCAN PASSPORT
2, SEND TO ME YOUR FULL ADDRESS DETAILS
3 YOUR DIRECT TELEPHONE WASP NUMBER FOR EASY CONNECTION
4 YOUR PRESENT OCCUPATION
ALL THIS INFORMATION IS NEEDED FOR THE NEXT STEP AS TO BE MY PARTNER IN THIS TRANSACTION AND MY PROPOSAL TO YOU DOES NOT INVOLVE IN ANY UPFRONT PAYMENT WHAT IS IMPORTANT IS TO MEET WITH ME FACE TO FACE FOR FINAL TRANSACTION BECAUSE THERE IS KNOW GOOD BUSINESS WITHOUT HANDSHAKING.
THANKS FOR YOUR UNDERSTANDING
YOURS TRULY
Mr MUHHAMED ABASS

subject: Re: ATTN
body:
Hello Mr. Muhhamed Abass,

I'm sorry to hear about the unfortunate circumstances that have led you to reach out for assistance. It sounds like a very complex situation indeed.

However, I must admit, I'm not entirely clear on some of the details you've shared. Could you please clarify what exactly is in the box? You mentioned it was declared as gold materials but also referred to it as money. 

Also, could you explain more about how this process works? How would claiming ownership of this box help resolve your current predicament?

I look forward to hearing from you soon and learning more about your situation.

Best wishes,
Thaddeus

subject: REMINDER Thaddeus
body:
Att Thaddeus
Thanks for your quick response to my proposal as I said earlier in my mail
to you that I need person to be the beneficiary of the trunk box of money
with the security vault as beneficiary since I have lost my late Boss who
is the real owner of the box deposited to the vault
Secondly  I mention to you that the box of money did not declared to the
vault as money what my late Boss declared to the security vault is that the
box contain jewelries and gold materials for security reasons so that the
vault we not aware that the content is money for all of us security
More so what I need you in this transaction is that I want you to be the
beneficiary of the box of the money as next of kin to the late depositor so
that both of us will benefit the fund since my.late Boss did not have
anybody as next of kin and nobody aware that my late Boss have money with
vault here in Cotonou west Africa

If you are interested you are to plan how to meet with me face to face for
final transaction because without your present face to face we cannot claim
the box as owner and whoever I present to the security vault they will
deliver the box to as new beneficiary since I am.the witness of the
transaction between vault and my late Boss

In conclusion if you are interested kindly scan to me your full.details and
your scan passport for the procurement of your name as the Beneficiary so
that we can move forward to the next step

So the transaction is free from all risk and does not involve in any
upfront payment till you will arrive for the claim and you make sure that
you can sponsor your trip for the transaction so this transaction is just
between two of us no third party

I will be eagerly to receive your reply so that I will know your decision
Sincerely
Muhhamed abbas

subject: Re: REMINDER Thaddeus
body:
Hello Muhhamed Abbas,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. It's quite an interesting situation you've found yourself in, and I appreciate your trust in considering me for this role.

I'm curious about a few things though. How did you come across my contact information? And why do you think I would be the right person to act as the next of kin to your late boss?

Also, could you please provide more details about this security vault? Is it a government institution or a private company? 

I'm sorry but I can't provide my passport or any other personal identification at this stage. However, I am open to continue discussing this matter further.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Thaddeus

subject: Re: REMINDER Thaddeus
body:
Attention Thaddeus
Thanks for your response and your interest on my proposal anyway not
everyone in life are bad or good but sometimes we need to trial yourself so
that we can know is trusty or not and fir sure I am an honest type

Concerned how I got your contact is good as you asked me I don't know you
from Adam but through my research in Google out of 12 email I search you
are the only email come from.my mind that I pick after my prayer and
fasting and I believe in God guidance and trust and that is why I contact
you directly on this business so that both of us will benefit from this
divine opportunity that is not scam or fraud

Furthermore the security vault is a private company but registered under
government for operation where every one can keep is good without any
problem and the security vault as I mention to you are not aware that the
content of the box is money what we told them by my late Boss that the
content of the box is jewelries and costumes materials for security reasons

In conclusion you did not have any problem with this transaction and does
not involve in any upfront payment what is paramount important is your
arrival to Meet with me face to face for final.transaction

If you are serious and ready for this transaction and capable to sponsor
your trip to meet with me kindly follow my instructions to send me your
scan passport    WhatsApp  telephone number to call you so that I can know
you very well before your arrival for transaction and this your details
needed for the procurement of the beneficiary ID card from the security
vault as the owner of the box in their custody

So kindly let me know if you are doing the transaction or not so that I
will know what to do next either to continue with you or look for another
person because I can't force you to do the transaction with me
Awaiting your quick response
Muhhamed Abass

subject: Re: REMINDER Thaddeus
body:
Hello Muhhamed Abass,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's quite interesting to hear about the security vault and its operations. I must say, it's a clever idea to tell them that the box contains jewelries and costumes materials for security reasons.

I'm curious though, how does one go about registering such a company under government operation? And what kind of security measures are in place to ensure the safety of these goods?

As for meeting face-to-face, I'm not sure if I can make any travel plans at the moment due to some personal commitments. Is there any other way we could proceed with this?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Thaddeus

subject: Re: REMINDER Thaddeus
body:
Where are you from and please can send me your direct telephone number for
verbal.discussion before we conclude awaiting your reply
Hammed abass

subject: Re: REMINDER Thaddeus
body:
Hello Hammed Abass,

It's nice to meet you! I'm from a small town, it's quite peaceful here. As for the phone number, I'm afraid I can't share that with you. But we can continue our conversation here. Is there anything specific you wanted to discuss?

Best wishes,
Thaddeus

subject: Re: REMINDER Thaddeus
body:
Hello Muhhamed Abass,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's interesting to hear about the security vault and how it operates. I must say, it sounds like a very secure way of storing valuable items.

I'm curious though, how does one go about registering such a box under their name? Is there a specific process or paperwork involved? And what happens if someone else tries to claim the box?

Also, you mentioned that my arrival is paramount. Could you please elaborate on why my physical presence is necessary for this transaction? 

Lastly, I'd like to know more about your late boss. What kind of person was he and how did he come into possession of such valuable items?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Thaddeus
